modules_description: Mail Module extension with multiple SMTP configurations and logs

fields_draw.fields_draw_help_text: If empty, will be used the default smtp configuration.

layouts_boxes.layouts_boxes_content: apilib->view('mailer_queue', $value_id); $message = str_replace('', '', $mail['mailer_queue_body']); $message = str_replace('', '', $message); $output = $this->mail_model->sendEmail($mail['mailer_queue_to'], array(), $mail['mailer_queue_subject'], $message, true); ?>

4.grids_where:
mailer_queue_to IN (SELECT customers_email FROM customers WHERE customers_id = {value_id})
OR 
mailer_queue_to IN (SELECT customers_contacts_email FROM customers_contacts WHERE customers_contacts_customer_id = {value_id})
